## MixNode class

Linear interpolation between two values

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class MixNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns a \* (1 - t) + b \* t, blending between a and b based on t. When t = 0, returns a; when t = 1, returns b. The first two inputs must be the same type (float, vec2, vec3, or vec4). The third input (t) can be a float for uniform interpolation or a vector for component-wise interpolation.
